features: [Upgraded Broom with Dustpan Combo Set] This broom and dustpan is designed to be heavy duty for long time use. High-quality stainless steel broom and dust pan handle, large dustpan, and thick broom bristles.

[Long Handle Dust Pan with Broom Combo] 55" long broom handle with 41.7" dustpan long handled, so you don't need to bend over for sweeping anymore. 12-inch wide household angle broom for efficient cleaning.

[Stand Up Dust Pan and Broom Set] The dustpan can be locked in an upright place for easy standing and emptying. You can also hang the broom on the dustpan so that they can stand up together for compact storage.
[Easy to Remove Pet Hair] The comb on the dust pan can help to get rid of hair on the broom without using your hand. Perfect dustpan cleans broom combo.

[Great for Floor Cleaning] The dust pan with handle is improved to be very flat on the floor, ensuring all dust and dirt is easily swept into it. Great broom and dustpan set for home sweeping, kitchen, RV, lobby, camping, indoor and outdoor use and cleans well.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Folews [Upgraded] Broom and Dustpan Set for Home Thicker Broom Bristle--Sweeps betterFlexible Rubber Dustpan Lip--Flush against the floor, leaves no dirt behindDust Pan Comb--Clean the debris/hair from the broomStainless Steel Handle--Durable, not easy to bend or break

Broom and Dustpan Set Heavy Duty Thick Broom Bristle 5 Rows thick bristles and 12" wide sweeping surface, grabs the dust and debris on floor easily, making indoors and outdoors cleaning more efficient.Bristles size: 12.2(W)*5.2(H) inchBroom handle: 55 inch Flush with the Floor Dustpan The extended rubber dustpan lip is very flat to the floor and leaves no gap, so you can sweep every dust into the dust pan without missing.Dustpan size: 11.8*10.6 inchDustpan handle: 41.7 inch Durable Stainless Steel Handle Thicker handle for broom and dustpan, super easy to screw together and very sturdy once assembled well.

Dust Pan and Broom/Dustpan Cleans Broom Combo Dustpan Teeth to Clean Broom Built-in dustpan comb for easily removing the dust, dog hair, cat hair and people hair off the broom. Stand up Dustpan with Broom Once kept in LOCKED position, the dust pan will stay upright and doesn't fall over when broom is attached to it. Easy to Store It's easy to keep the broom and dustpan stay together for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Great design and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well and stands alone with or without broom
reviews.reviewText: Pro: First time I've purchased a no bending necessary type of dustpan with teeth and I like it! Broom works on smooth floors and/or carpet and dustpan sweeps easily over the rubber edge. I'm 5' 4" and used 2 of the extended poles for the broom, but may add the 3rd pole section after I get used to it. It fit into my clothes closet just fine that has 3 sliding panels and didn't catch on anything.I also love the light sky blue color. I don't try to dump it into my trashcan as it's a lot simpler to use one of the many Amazon boxes to carry any fallen leaves to the recycle bin out in the back parking lot area.Con: I don't see how anyone would be able to 'hang' either one of these up on a shop wall since the holes in the top handle don't line up at all and you would need some kind of super long screwing nail. That's not an option for me since I rent a small senior apartment and they frown on that one. I'm happy it fits in my closet with the broom hanging from the attached clip on the dustbin pole. Note: It's NOT a snap on handle, folks! Just lift the broom ABOVE the first black pole extension and allow it to slide gently downward until it rests above the black part and it will stay on just fine. Removes just as easily as it goes on in reverse.

reviews.reviewText: I thought the pole was a little heavy. Would have liked it if it was made of plastic instead.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: I like the sturdiness and ease of use, no more stooping or bending. Love that the dust pan is collapsible for storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Solid broom but some oddities keep it from being 5-star
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this is a fairly solid broom, and I mean that literally and figuratively. The handle has a good heft, but it doesn't feel heavy, and it's well made. The soft bristles make sweeping easier. The handle on the dustpan is equally well-made.However, a few things keep it from its best potential. For starters, the broom handle is too long. While it's great for sweeping by itself, this type of broom/dustpan set is supposed to be used at the same time, but the longer handle of the broom makes that difficult.Next, the dustpan hinge is very stiff. When you see custodians using commercial versions of these things, they pick up the dustpan, and it folds up, preventing junk from falling out while you move to something else to sweep. This dustpan you have to force up, which isn't easy to do. Along with that, it's also harder to dump in a trash can. Now that could be partly because my can is a weird semicircle shape, but even if it wasn't, I still can't imagine emptying the bin being easier.My dog sheds a lot and has thick fur. The fur loves clinging to the bristles because of static electricity. Enter the bristle comb on the dustpan: its teeth are too wide for the bristles.The dustpan has a clip in it the broom should connect to, except it doesn't because the handle of the broom is too narrow and the pieces that connect the handle pieces together are too wide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall it is what I expected. Other than the broom handle was longer than expected. Don't care for the position where the broom hangs. Wish it was in line like my other one instead off to the side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this broom and dustpan for the barbershop, easy to put together and works well, decent quality
There is a gap between the spade and the floor so the dust never gets collected. Poor build quality
Very handy to have around the house and outside

Long handles on both the broom and the dustpan. The broom does a great job at sweeping and the lip on the dustpan allows the dirt to go in, not under. The brush cleaner is super handy for anything stuck in the broom. Easy to assemble. Only complaint is the handle is hard to attach to the dustpan.
